content: निर्णयः, निर्णीत, निर्णेतृ &c. See under निर्णी.

निर्णयः {@--1@} Removing, removal. {@--2@} Complete ascertainment, decision, affirmation, determination, settlement; संदेहनिर्णयो जातः <ls>Ś. 1. 28</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 301</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">409</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">9. 250</ls>, <ls>Y. 2. 10</ls>; हृदयं निर्णयमेव धावति <ls>Ki. 2. 29.</ls> {@--3@} Deduction, inference, conclusion, demonstration (in logic). {@--4@} Discussion, investigation, consideration. {@--5@} Sentence, verdict, judgment; सर्वज्ञस्याप्येकाकिनो निर्णयाभ्युपगमो दोषाय <ls>M. 1.</ls> {@--6@} Application of a conclusive argument. {@--7@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Narration of events.
